chapters.name: A Voyage
chapters.text: You've been at sea for months searching for a mythical creature. As you sit up in the crows nest there's nothing but a blue smooth water as far as you can see. Suddenly, you see something appear just on the horizon off the port bow. It might be smoke.

choices.text: Inform the captain. There's been nothing interesting for a while.
Keep it to yourself. You've been told only to bother him if you see scales, wings, and fire.

chapters.name: Ignore The Smoke
chapters.text:
You tell the captain and just as you thought, he screams, "[[name]]! Them's the locals, lad! Keep looking for the beast"

You go back to looking. Maybe you'll see something interesting again tomorrow.

chapters.name: More Sailing
chapters.text: You say nothing and the ship sails on. You can't help but wonder what's going on over there, though.
